entry.title: [GRA7][Public Cloud] Upgrade to Stein
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Apr 19, 19:00 UTC  -  Apr 20, 01:00 UTC

Mar 14, 08:38 UTC
Update - Due to an imponderable we postpone the upgrade operation to Stein for 19/04 from 19h00 UTC to 01h00 UTC

Feb 2, 18:46 UTC
Scheduled - A maintenance operation is scheduled for the GRA7 region on April 05, 2022, between 19:00 and 01:00 (UTC). No disruption is expected on your instances. Some APIs will remain unreachable during the operation.

The API endpoints that will be maintained are the following:
https://compute.gra7.cloud.ovh.net
https://network.compute.gra7.cloud.ovh.net
https://volume.compute.gra7.cloud.ovh.net
https://image.compute.gra7.cloud.ovh.net
https://workflow.gra7.cloud.ovh.net
https://orchestration.gra7.cloud.ovh.net

The other regions will remain accessible by API and via your OVH manager.
This operation allows us to prepare for the future. Thanks to this OpenStack upgrade, we will be able to continue to improve our Public Cloud offering by providing you with new features in the coming months.
The API calls you are used to using will not change, this new version is backwards compatible with the old one.
The target versions of the OpenStack components in this region will be:
Glance : 18 (Stein) ;
Cinder : 14 (Stein) ;
Nova : 19 (Stein) ;
Neutron : 14 (Stein) ;
Heat : 12 (Stein) ;

The components not affected by this operation are :
Keystone : 11 (Ocata) ;
Swift : 2.25 (Ussuri) ;
Horizon : 13 (Queens) ;
Mistral : 7 (Rocky) ;

This update is an important step in the development of the product. Other regions will be concerned by equivalent developments in the coming weeks. To know the detail of the new functionalities, go to https://releases.openstack.org/stein/highlights.html
Compute (Nova) https://docs.openstack.org/nova/stein/reference/api-microversion-history.html#maximum-in-newton
Network (Neutron) https://docs.openstack.org/releasenotes/neutron/stein.html
Volume (Cinder) https://docs.openstack.org/cinder/latest/contributor/api_microversion_history.html#maximum-in-newton
If you want to test the behavior of the updated software versions you can use the GRA9 and SBG7 regions which already expose the target versions.

entry.title: [SBG2a][RBX1a] Migration MicroServices to Kubernetes SNC
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 29, 08:00 - 16:00 UTC

Mar 22, 15:38 UTC
Scheduled - Start time : 29/03/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 29/03/2022 16:00 UTC
Service impact : No impact in production, only some connection timeout in the automation at the time of the intervention
Service improvement: Migrate the current Pcc microservice from standalone container host to Kubernetes infrastructure

entry.title: [BHS3][Compute] - Storage
entry.content:
THIS IS A SCHEDULED EVENT Mar 29, 08:00 - 14:10 UTC

Mar 14, 13:21 UTC
Scheduled - [BHS3][Containers & Orchestration] - Storage
Start time : 29/03/2022 08:00 UTC
End time : 29/03/2022 14:00 UTC
Service impact : This maintenance operation will prevent the scheduling of backups during the downtime (1 to 3 hours) of the Mistral service.
Backups will be re-scheduled the next day as usual.
Service improvement : The objective of this maintenance is to upgrade underlaying infrastructure.

entry.title: Analytics Data Platform End-Of-Life notice for public offers
entry.content:
Mar 18, 14:46 UTC
Completed - The scheduled maintenance has been completed.

Dec 29, 14:50 UTC
Update - We will be undergoing scheduled maintenance during this time.

Dec 10, 21:49 UTC
Scheduled - We will end the Sales of Analytics Data Platform (preinstalled Apache Hadoop Big Data Clusters) 31/12/2021 (no more new services).

We will end the Support of Analytics Data Platforms services 28/02/2022.
Existing services can be kept by customers, since it's preinstalled offers. But no official support will be provided.

Impacted customers will be notified during November 2021 by email about this End-Of-Life process.
Perimeter : All Analytics Data Platforms public offers, worldwide.

We will update this task during the proposed timeline.
